0:
Welcome to Moving the Goalposts, your home for cutting-edge soccer analysis that isn't afraid to challenge conventional wisdom and shift perspectives.
On this channel, we go beyond just highlights and match recaps. Our team of experts dissects the finer tactical details, debunks myths, and provides fresh, insightful commentary on the latest storylines from around the world of football.
Whether it's breaking down a manager's bold strategic decisions, reassessing what defines success for a high-profile team or uncovering the unsung impact players, we're always willing to "move the goalposts" and reframe how the game is viewed and understood.
You'll get in-depth video essays, robust statistical analysis, impassioned debates, and unique angles you won't find anywhere else. We cele¬brate the beautiful game while fearlessly questioning the established narratives.
Hit that subscribe button to join our movement and never miss an upload!
